00043 template<class TYPE> class AffxArray;
00044 
00049 class AffxFile
00050 {
00051 public:
00052         enum m_enumOpenOptions{LOAD = 0, SAVE, APPEND}; 
00053 
00054 public:
00055         static void mkdir(const AffxString& str);
00056         static void rmdir(const AffxString& str);
00057         static void remove(const AffxString& str) {Util::fileRemove(str.c_str());}
00058         static AffxString parseDirectory(const AffxString& str);
00059         static AffxString parseFileName(const AffxString& str);
00060 
00061         static unsigned int getFileSize(const AffxString& strFileName);
00062         static unsigned int getRowCount(const AffxString& strFileName);
00063         
00064         static bool readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, AffxByteArray& ba);
00065         static bool readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, void *p, unsigned int dwNumberBytes);
00066         static bool writeFile(const AffxString& strFileName, AffxByteArray& ba);
00067         static bool writeFile(const AffxString& strFileName, void* p, unsigned int dwNumberBytes);
00068 
00069         AffxFile();
00070         virtual ~AffxFile();
00071 
00072         bool open(const AffxString& strFileName, m_enumOpenOptions enumOpenOption);
00073         bool isOpen() {return ((m_pfileStream != NULL) && (m_pfileStream->is_open()));}
00074         
00075         void read(char* p, unsigned int iLength, unsigned int& iBytesRead);
00076         void write(const char *psz) {if (m_pfileStream != NULL) {m_pfileStream->write(psz, (std::streamsize)strlen(psz));}}
00077 
00078         bool readLine(AffxByteArray& baLine);
00079         bool readLine();
00080         void writeLine(const AffxString& str);
00081         void writeLineFeed() ; 
00082 
00083         void flush() {if (m_pfileStream != NULL) {m_pfileStream->flush();}}
00084         void close(void) 
00085         {
00086                 if (isOpen()) 
00087                 {
00088                         m_pfileStream->close(); 
00089                         delete m_pfileStream; 
00090                         m_pfileStream =  NULL;
00091                         if (m_cb != NULL) {delete[] m_cb; m_cb = NULL;}
00092                         m_icbLength = 0;
00093                         m_iMarkedChar = UNMARKED;
00094                         m_iReadAheadLimit = 0; 
00095                         m_bSkipLF = false;
00096                         m_bMarkedSkipLF = false;        
00097                         m_iChars = 0;
00098                         m_iNextChar = 0;
00099                 }
00100         }
00101   // This function is ok if you dont want to link to the file5 library.
00102   // However, if you are, then it would be best to use:
00103   // int File5_File::isHdf5file(filename)
00104   // @todo Replace calls to isHdf5 with 'File5_File::isHdf5file'
00105         static bool isHdf5(const AffxString& strFileName);
00106 
00107 protected:
00108         void fill();
00109         static int findIndex(AffxString& str);  
00110 
00111 protected:      
00112     static int INVALIDATED;
00113     static int UNMARKED;
00114 
00115         std::fstream* m_pfileStream;
00116     char* m_cb;
00117         int m_icbLength;
00118     int m_iChars;
00119         int m_iNextChar;
00120         int m_iBufferSize;
00121     int m_iMarkedChar;
00122     int m_iReadAheadLimit; /* Valid only when m_iMarkedChar > 0 */
00123     bool m_bSkipLF;
